meanings.sent1: I prebooked my flight for next month.
meanings.sent2: She always prebooks her hotel rooms to get the best deals.
meanings.sent3: The organized traveler prebooked all her tours before arriving.
meanings.sent4: Planning ahead, he prebooked all his appointments for the week.
meanings.sent5: By prebooking early, you can secure your spot in popular attractions.

meanings.sent1: The prebooked seats were all taken on the crowded bus.
meanings.sent2: We were lucky to find a prebooked table at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The prebooked hotel room had a beautiful view of the city.
meanings.sent4: The prebooked tickets saved us from waiting in long lines.
meanings.sent5: The prebooked car rental made our vacation stress-free.
